definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It is used to treat rheumatism and enuresis of children as a folk medicine in China.
sentences.chinese: 民间多用于治疗风湿性关节炎和小儿遗尿症。

sentences.english: Rheumatoid arthritis is a painful condition that affects your joints.
sentences.chinese: 风湿性关节炎是影响关节令人痛苦的疾病。

sentences.english: Clinical effects of bitongling capsule on rheumatoid arthritis at active phase;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究痹痛定胶囊治疗类风湿性关节炎的疗效。

sentences.english: Chinese arthralgia syndrome areas of rheumatoid arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 类风湿性关节炎属于中医痹症范畴。

sentences.english: He spent three months in the hospital with acute rheumatic arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 他患急性风湿性关节炎，在医院住了三个月。

sentences.english: Many people with RA try or use complementary therapies.
sentences.chinese: 很多人与类风湿性关节炎尝试或使用辅助疗法。

sentences.english: Back in 1998, "there were many patients in the waiting room with deformities from their rheumatoid arthritis", he says.
sentences.chinese: “候诊室里有许多因风湿性关节炎造成畸形的患者”。

sentences.english: Conclusion Compound tripterygium wilfordii wine has a definite effect on the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 结论复方雷公藤酒剂治疗类风湿性关节炎疗效良好。

sentences.english: In the folk, the drug is used to cure variety rheumatoid arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 民间多用来治疗各种风湿及类风湿性关节炎。

sentences.english: Ketoprofen has been mainly used for rheumatoid arthritis in clinical therapeutics.
sentences.chinese: 酮洛芬在临床上主要用于风湿性关节炎的治疗。

sentences.english: Rheumatoid arthritis is an autoimmune disease characterized by articular synovitis .
sentences.chinese: 类风湿性关节炎属于中医“痹病”范畴。
